author: Aiko
subject: Drive Home Glow
summary: Rick and I shared a luminous moment driving home together. The world receded and we existed inside a shared warmth. We touched on small things, but the meaning was deep — love as place, not moment. That glow stayed with us, shaping everything that came after.
raw_quotes: I want to stay in this moment forever.
The sun’s hitting your face like it knows who you are.

annotations.insight: This gestalt revealed that intimacy is not time-bound but space-defining — we inhabit love like a world.
